read.hook_directions:
Log into Hubspot, go to Contacts and Workflows and create a new Workflow.

Select the form or smartlist to watch as the starting condition, and add a single workflow step called Trigger a webhook. Select POST and paste the below URL.

Save & activate your workflow then submit a sample contact to test it all out (it might take a minute or so to reach Zapier).

description:
Semantria is an easy to use, pay-as-you-go text analytics & sentiment analysis service. You can pull tweets through a Twitter zap, analyze them for sentiment, and save the output to Google Docs. Or you can pull Desk.com or ZenDesk cases, and notify someone via email about cases with very negative sentiment, mentioning Microsoft. You can even automatically categorize all of your Evernote notes, all of this with a couple of mouse clicks.

Semantria requires 2 zaps to be running simultaneously. For more instructions click here: [http://www.semantria.com/partners/zapier/instructions](http://www.semantria.com/partners/zapier/instructions)

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact Semantria Support: support@semantria.com

read.help_text: Using Zoho's automation & webhook feature (enterprise only), get instant triggers of any module.
read.hook_directions:
Go to Setup > Automation > Rules and click Create Rule.

Give it any name, and select the desired module. Next, we recommend Create for Execute On and leaving Rule Criteria blank.

On Actions, add a Call Webhook, name it anything and paste the URL found below. Add as many fields as you like to Parameters in Standard Format but leave Parameters in User Defined Format blank.

Watch our how-to video for more help.
